channel.title: JVM Company V4 server. [317]
channel.description:
[center] [b][u]I started a new project because my computer crashed. And I lost all my files.[/u][/b]
All old JVM servers I released are deleted now. Only the V1 is still up for download. I opened a forums to see what people liked about all version of the JVM servers. It came up that people liked the delta the most. So now i'm making a new delta (sorry). I'm going to rewrite the combat and adding the things people asked me from the other versions. Again, JVM [u]doesn't[/u] stand for Java Virtual Machine.
The first easy thing I added was class choosing. I added this because lots of people hated the "pure" command you could use that made your stats 99. Now I made you can only choose one class and use only one time.
[b]- The class choosing: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fdsuMuqko2Q - Fixed the teleporting in combat. (Fist you had to click over 100 times if you was in combat before you finally teled.) - Magic combat: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gJBP63jsYAQ - Fixed X-logging[/b]
The next thing I going to do is rewriting the magic combat in the newest JVM. I will post pictures/videos soon!

Good work man. I played JVM Company.

item.title: JVM Company V4 server. [317]
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

[quote=“blakeman8192, post:7, topic:309350”]you know… JVM actually does stand for Java Virtual Machine… the main JRE component that runs all Java programs…
it was around before your java programming company was (common sense), so you’re stealing it’s name.
…and it’s copyrighted…

facepalm[/quote]

No, me and 3 friends came up Jordie Vince Martyn and called JVM because we were bored and made this. We didn’t even know that JVM means java virtual machine. Well, now we know but when we started with JVM we didn’t.

[quote=“lordy570, post:6, topic:309350”]Hello Moparscape’ers The Jvm Company is Not the realy one :o

my friend is Vincent on msn and Games And He stopped

Soz The owner From Jvm Now Has Stealed the server From another One !!![/quote]

Please stfu. If you look in old topics of my smkscape times. You will see i’m the creater of JVM. Plus my name is not vincent but vince.

Read full topic

item.title: JVM Company V4 server. [317]
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

[center]
I started a new project because my computer crashed. And I lost all my files.

All old JVM servers I released are deleted now. Only the V1 is still up for download. I opened a forums to see what people liked about all version of the JVM servers. It came up that people liked the delta the most. So now i’m making a new delta (sorry). I’m going to rewrite the combat and adding the things people asked me from the other versions. Again, JVM doesn’t stand for Java Virtual Machine.

The first easy thing I added was class choosing. I added this because lots of people hated the “pure” command you could use that made your stats 99. Now I made you can only choose one class and use only one time.

[b]- The class choosing: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fdsuMuqko2Q

  • Fixed the teleporting in combat. (Fist you had to click over 100 times if you was in combat before you finally teled.)
  • Magic combat: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gJBP63jsYAQ
  • Fixed X-logging[/b]

The next thing I going to do is rewriting the magic combat in the newest JVM. I will post pictures/videos soon!
